pr_title: Add feature flag control of default jvm gc options

timeline.message: Add feature flag control of default jvm gc options

timeline.bodyText: Consider adding a default implementation (you'll have to do that later anyway) + adding a comment on its purpose.
timeline.author: bjorncs

replies.bodyText: I think we will keep this flag for a very long time for rolling out chnages to GC  as we discover better combinations.
replies.author: baldersheim
